text: The match for the Johan Cruijff-schaal X was held on 5 August 2005 between the 2004–05 Eredivisie champions and KNVB Cup winners PSV and Eredivisie runners- up Ajax. Ajax won the match 2–1. ==Match details== {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Gomes |- |RB ||2 || André Ooijer |- |CB ||4|| Alex |- |CB ||5|| Wilfred Bouma |- |LB ||3|| Lee Young-pyo |- |DM ||6 || Timmy Simons || |- |CM ||16 || Theo Lucius |- |CM ||8|| Phillip Cocu (c) |- |RW ||17 || Jefferson Farfán |- |CF ||9|| Jan Vennegoor of Hesselink || || |- |LW ||20|| Ibrahim Afellay || |- |colspan=4|Substitutes: |- |FW ||29 || Robert || || |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Guus Hiddink |- |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||12 || Hans Vonk |- |RB ||4 || John Heitinga |- |CB ||3|| Zdeněk Grygera |- |CB ||5 || Julien Escudé (c) |- |LB ||19 || Urby Emanuelson |- |DM ||8 || Hedwiges Maduro |- |CM ||16 || Nigel de Jong || || |- |CM ||28 || Nourdin Boukhari || |- |RW ||10|| Steven Pienaar || || |- |CF ||9|| Angelos Charisteas |- |LW ||11|| Ryan Babel || |- |colspan=4|Substitutes: |- |FW ||7|| Mauro Rosales || || |- |MF ||6|| Tomáš Galásek || || |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Danny Blind |- |} |} 2005 Johan Cruijff-schaal j j Johan Cruyff Shield
title: 2005 Johan Cruyff Shield
